text: game satungen (samaharak obage) bara osavagena yamatada, (venat samaharak obage) aharaya sandahada, (ohuma utpadanaya kara ætteya. ebævin) allah obata laba di æti mevayen (aharayata gata hæki dæya) oba anubhava karanu. (mehidi) seyitange pa satahan anugamanaya nokaranu. niyata vasayenma ohu obata prakata satureku vanneya
